entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 16 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3 except low minus 8 inland.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3 except low minus 8 inland. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 11 February 2023
